We are registered under MSME: UDYAM-DL-01-0000010.

Section 16 of the MSMED Act provides that in case buyer fails to make payment of amount to the MSME supplier, then the buyer shall be liable to pay compound interest with monthly rest to such supplier. This provision has an overriding effect on the agreement, if any, between the buyer and the MSME supplier.

Further, Section 17 of MSMED Act provides that for goods supplied or services rendered by the MSME supplier, the buyer shall be liable to pay amount with interest thereon as provided under Section 16.
Section 16 of the MSMED Act provides that the buyer shall be liable to pay compound interest with monthly rest to the MSME supplier at three times the bank rate notified by the RBI.
Invoices shall be made on every first day of the next month for the month closing, and shall be sent over by email to your registered email address same day.
Mid month closure invoices shall be sent over email within 1-2 days of pickup.
Account Managers shall also submit invoices, but in case if account manager is not able to submit the invoice, e-copy is valid as well and can be used for GST claims
If any discrepancy is found in the invoice, please reply to the invoice email and same shall be rectified within 24 hours.
Credit limit and credit days have to be maintained in strict accordance and agreement and failure to do so shall also reflect in our service level downgrades.
For Rental closure, a formal written communication will only be accepted by your registered email ID to , , receivable@youngman.co.in and arai@youngman.co.in .

If, within 30 (30) days of receipt of the Bill, the Customer does not notify YIPL in writing of a dispute related to the Bill, the Customer shall be deemed to have waived any dispute related to the Bill and the Bill shall be considered correct and complete. In case of any dispute including dispute of non-payment in respect of any Bill raised by YIPL, the same shall be referred to the arbitration and the judgment/award given by the sole arbitrator appointed by YIPL shall be final and binding. The Civil Suit at Delhi can also be filed at the option of YIPL.

In Case of Damage only and not missing, to avail a cover upto a certain limit, you can opt for
YOUNGMAN SILVER COVER: waiver upto first INR 50,000 estimate value, by paying extra 15% of the rental value YOUNGMAN GOLD COVER: waiver upto first INR 1,00,000 estimate value, by paying extra 25% of the rental value
At the time of delivery of material, material checklist is signed by your representative and can be used at time of pickup to justify if any claims are fair or not.

In case of any dispute whatsoever, the same shall be referred to the arbitration and the judgment/award given by the sole arbitrator appointed by YIPL shall be final and binding upon the undersigned entity. The Civil Suit at Delhi can also be filed at the option of YIPL.
